name: England League Soccer
description:
Live the 2014/2015 English League Championship while it is played
Choose your favourite team and play the matches of the real championship season.
The idea is to play one match a week like the pros and compare your results with those of real teams at the end of the season
Served by superbs 3D graphics, animations and sounds, England League Football Pro is based on a highly realistic physic engine in which football moves have been coded by football fans.

Main Features
-Full 3D environnement
-5 different team strategy
-Easy tu use paddle for best gameplay
-Game available in your langage
